column5: I can see a lot of love was put into the creation of this work of art.  You got yourself a wonderful woman, treat her well  John
Very nice fishnsled.

Finally getting around to getting some pics put together and want to share this awesome gift that my girlfriend made for me.  Over the past year she has spent countless hours and a fair amount of money making me a new quilt for the bed.  What kind of quilt would be more appropriate for a fisherman the a fishing quilt!    Each square has a fishing/outdoor theme in the centre and the edges are made up of various fabarics.  The quilting itself looks like ripples on the water, some have said, and others a fly line being cast.  You can judge for yourself.        The edge around the quilt looks like this.    Now it's time to do get rid of the wallpaper and do some painting.  Thank you very much.  Love ya.
That looks awesome. You better hang on to her for a while. Nice work.

How sweet is that!  I grew up making quilts with my grandmother and only stopped a few years ago to put in more time painting.  Believe me, it takes longer to make a quilt than for me to paint a painting. Nice present!!  Pam
That is an awesome gift. Very nice work....and straight from her heart!
Absolutely beautiful...My grandmother used to make them..Heart and soul go into them.

"My fingers hurt"  "What's that?"  "My fingers hurt.  "  "Oh, well now your back's gonna hurt, cuz you just pulled landscaping duty. Anybody elses fingers hurt? I didn't think so."  Sorry.. the quilt reminded me of a random scene from Happy Gilmore.  Nice gift!
Very nice.  Lots of work in that quilt. I'd rather have that than a gift that was purchased. You a lucky guy.
That is just awesome.  I'm very impressed.  Make sure you thank her over and over and   over again.  Beautiful.  Joey
That's awesome , must of took a long time to make,and alota thought put in.
very cool
That is indeed an awesome quilt.  I'm many on here would love one just like it.  The GF sounds like a keeper !!!
Fifty years from now, that quilt might be tattered and discoloured but you'll never get rid of it. They're just one of those things that become part of what you are. It's a great gift.
Thats a spectacular quilt,wow
Wow, that is just too cool. My wife makes quilts so I know how much work is involved in making one. You a lucky man
Very very nice !!
Thats totaly awesome!!!!!!!!
Wow, that's nice, my mom started making quilts last year....hmmmm I wonder..... your girlfriend is very talented that's for sure  Maureen
That is super. You've got a keeper in that GF
That ain't just a quilt...................  it's a Masterpiece!!
Beautiful job.  There are many here who would love to have it.

Could not agree more with what carp said. It is beautiful and when someone puts that much time and energy into something for you personally you know its from the heart. You are most certainly one very lucky fella.
That's impressive, I hope you appreciate what she did for you!  Mike
ABSOLUTELY!!!!  Thanks for the comments everyone.  It's certainly something I will treasure for a lifetime.
wow your GF has some skills, it's a beauty
Beautiful work, a labour of love  An original not another like it, you are a lucky guy fishnsled, enjoy.  Mick.
